name: SeaMonkey Show Target URL for Hyperlink
description:
tong+ Show Target URL for Hyperlink (tested on Seamonkey 2.x)

Show target URL when hover over a hyperlink. Useful for full screen mode where the statusbar is hidden.
Also useful in normal windows mode since you can hide the statusbar for extra vertical space.
additional_info:
Release notes:
2013-05-13
- Trying to reduce burden on browser by remove text shadowing and translucent background
- Force style of text font to be normal
- Change text color and background color; feel free to override this setting to your liking

2013-01-13
- Make appearance of the target URL tooltip more resembles modern browsers tooltip (Firefox, IE, Chrome)
- Fix misplace tooltip on Google Reader
- Bump z-index for pages which have elements with insanely high z-index value

2012-12-29
- Fix misplace paragraph style on Twitter
- Fix blank tooltip when hover over a photo on Facebook

2012-12-23
- Initial version.
- Tested on Seamonkey 2.x
